Articles.Content:
I\'ve yet to purchase the game yet but the demo is great! This game definitely has tons of potential, though I\'m probably going to hold off on purchasing for a bit as I don\'t feel too comfortable with it possibly being slightly more developed than the current demo.

I wish you guys the best of luck!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

There is a pretty significant difference now. Better terrain and plugins. Besides, the price may go up at any time.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the site!

Certainly does have loads of potential and always worth enjoying listening to the devs and improvements they do.
